headline: NRG Energy, Inc. to Report First Quarter 2025 Financial Results on May 12, 2025
summary: HOUSTON - NRG Energy, Inc. plans to report its first quarter 2025 financial results on Monday, May 12, 2025. Management will present the results during a conference call and webcast at 9:00 a.m. EST...

headline: Welcome Home: Vivint Debuts New Brand Identity, Signaling a New Era in Smart Home
summary: LEHI, Utah, May 05, 2025--Over the past 25 years, Vivint has grown from a singular focus on home security to pioneering an integrated smart home experience with security at its core. Today’s unveiling of a new visual identity represents both an evolution and expansion of that focus, redefining a truly smarter home experience to include smarter energy management.
